body.name: GNC Vitamin C 1000 with Bioflavonoids and Rose Hips Timed Release 180 Tablets
features: GNC Vitamin C - 1000 mg: Timed-Release If you’re looking for a convenient way to receive the benefits of immune support, you can add GNC Vitamin C 1,000mg to your daily dietary supplement regimen. This protective antioxidant is essential for healthy bones, teeth, blood vessels and collagen. Plus, these vegetarian caplets also contain bioflavonoids and rose hips, all woven within a timed-release formula. Timed-release, vegetarian caplets
Protective antioxidant vitamin provides immune support*
Dietary supplement contains 1,000mg of vitamin C, 25mg of citrus bioflavonoids complex 4:1 and rose hips powder per serving
Vitamin C with citrus extract flavonoids may have better absorption and retention in the body

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GNC Vitamin C Dietary Supplement With Bioflavonoids & Rose Hips 1000 MG Vitamin C is essential for healthy bones, assisting the absorption of iron, providing immune support and offering powerful antioxidant protection—just to name a few of its functions. It’s also a big player in maintaining your bones, teeth and blood vessels—and it’s a powerful antioxidant to boot.* Recommended Intake The latest recommendations on Vitamin C for antioxidant protection are 90 mg/d for men and 75 mg/d for women, with smokers needing an additional 35 mg/d.* How to Use As a dietary supplement, take one to two caplets daily. For maximum benefits, take as directed every day.

GNC sets the industry standard for ingredient transparency, truth in labeling and product potency—all while remaining on the cutting edge of nutritional science. We know that one person’s journey is different from another’s, which is why we carry a large assortment of products in stores and online. GNC is committed to helping our community lead healthier, better lives. Shop, save and support your needs at your local store, one of our other 9,000 locations, your phone and many other convenient ways.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewText: I have been using GNC products for 30 years and I have enjoyed good health and a great immune system for years - I started taking the time released vitamin C with rose hips and bioflavonoids along with CoQ10 as I believe they are a great immune system boosters - I have not had to take antibiotics for years and I believe that this is part of the reason why - great products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love Vitamin C from a trusted brand
reviews.reviewText: I trust the GNC brand since it's been around forever. I also trust vitamin C, now that I've researched it on the internet.Even though nobel prize winner Linus Pauling was proven wrong about his claims that it can cure cancer, there has been a lot of talk about how it can cure a wide variety of diseases.While I'm not sure how much faith to put into these claims, I do know that for me, as long as I take two 1000 IU's per day of vitamin C, my allergies are gone. It works the same way for my mother's allergies to her cat. One minute she is sneezing and blowing her nose violently and as soon as she takes a vitamin C, her allergy symptoms come to a halt. It has antihistamine properties.Since this is timed release, it seems to work differently from the usual inexpensive vitamin C pills I get at the drugstore. To be specific, these don't have that kind of immediate effect. I assume that since they are slow release, the vitamin is released so gradually that the effect is blunted, as far as allergies go.But I will say this: I feel a lot healthier when I take this per day. I have only tried taking one per day but soon will increase my experimental doseage to two per day to see how I feel. Since vitamin C is quicly washed out of the body, it doesn't hurt to really load up on it. I suggest to anyone with some mild, diverse physical symptoms of an indeterminate nature or anyone with allergies and asthma to try taking a couple of these per day and see how they feel.I am hoping this isn't washed out of my body as quickly as a regular vitamin C pill would be.I specifically got these since they are timed release. This should provide terrific antioxidant power. I took off one star since I don't get the initial big reaction that regular vitamin C pills give, of clearing my sinuses and making me feel more alert, but these may provide better all day antioxidant protection.The fact that these contain bioflavonoids and rose hips was another important consideration for me in my decision to purchase these.

reviews.reviewText: Since I started taking my vitamins, (This, fish oils, calcium, D3, magnesium, C and folic acid, my mental state is so much better. My mom died last year and I really struggled. This year-- no holiday depression. I really believe it's the vitamins!
